ygData.subject: Reed's Bard Song Analysis Spreadsheet V 2.00 beta
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve a new (and beta) release of the spreadsheet: Release 2.0 beta http://www.geocities.com/eqreed/BardSongSpreadsheet.html This is a major change; as I m
ygData.messageBody:
I've a new (and beta) release of the spreadsheet: Release 2.0 beta

http://www.geocities.com/eqreed/BardSongSpreadsheet.html

This is a major change; as I'm going full formula for all of the
songs (and I've learned a heck of a lot over the past month.)
Virtually every song has changed, and I've got a lot more resolution
on levels and instruments.

I've also added the ability to select an instrument by name, and
Singing Short Sword Support (Select SSS for Voice instrument).

THIS IS BETA
Please, if you can, do some testing of the numbers on this
spreadsheet, and please report any differences. Posting on the
Concert Hall or e-mail me (eqreed@...) is the best way to get
ahold of me.

Note that if the AC is off by one, it's probably not a bug. (Just
ask, and I'll go into my findings on AC, it's not as straight forward
as one would think).

Enjoy, and please let me know where it's wrong. It still consider
this very beta and I make a lot of stupid mistakes /grin

- Reed Stormwind (54 bard of E'ci) <forlorn>
